description.value: Your horn may not appear precisely as that of a unicorn, but it seems to accomplish much of the same magic. You may select one feat that requires you to be a unicorn to gain. You must still meet all of the featâ€™s other prerequisites. Additionally, you may cast mage hand and light as arcane innate spells at will. The target of your light spell must be your own horn. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
